sentences.sContent: Cognitive consonance is a consistency between the knowledge, ideas and beliefs.
sentences.sContent_eng: Cognitive consonance is a consistency between the knowledge, ideas and beliefs.
sentences.sCn: 认识一致是知识、思想和信念之间的一致。

sentences.sContent: One becomes sharply aware, but without regret, of the limits of mutual understanding and consonance with other people.
sentences.sContent_eng: One becomes sharply aware, but without regret, of the limits of mutual understanding and consonance with other people.
sentences.sCn: 人们会清楚地发觉，同别人的相互了解和协调一致是有限度的，但这不值得惋惜。

sentences.sContent: The feelings and mood are thick at every moment in the day time, which need more deposition and consonance, letting us taste blessedness and happiness.
sentences.sContent_eng: The feelings and mood are thick at every moment in the day time, which need more deposition and consonance, letting us taste blessedness and happiness.
sentences.sCn: 白天的每一刻思绪与心情都是浑浊的，它需要更多的沉淀与调和，让我们品味幸福与快乐的味道。

remMethod.val: con(共同) ＋ son(声音) ＋ ance → 共同的声音 → 一致， 调和

words.tran: 带辅音性质的；辅音的；子音的

trans.tranCn: 一致， 调和； 和音
